Efficient FrontierÂ¶

Once the moments of the distribution of market invariants has been estimated, portfolio weights must be calculated. These weights must optimise certain utility functions, that is chosen by the user. The classical utility functions include the Sharpe Ratio, efficient risk, return and minimum volatility. All of these have been implemented here.

This eff_frontier module calculates the optimal portfolio weights given the mean, covariance, skew and kurtosis of the data, for various utility functions. Currently implemented: - Maximum Sharpe Ratio - Minimum Volatility - Efficient Risk - Efficient Return
